game.name: Gravity
game.description:
It is always difficult to walk and run to the opposite of gravity. You obviously fall when you dare to attempt such a task. And, what would be a scenario when you have two gravities to adjust while walking. Today we have brought to you a brand new arcade game where you will only survive if you change the gravity on time. So, do you think that you want to try out this unique puzzle challenge? Join Gravity game and get ready to help a character who wants to walk and run on two gravities!

Your objective in this cool free online html5 endless runner game is to change his gravity before he rushes to the wrong platform. Do not forget to grab the jewels and coins you see on his way. You can use those jewels to purchase new skin for him. Your quick reflexes and good control over the LMB would definitely work when it comes to paving the way to the high score. Keep track of your score by checking the top left corner of the screen, while top right corner of the screen will show how much jewels you have earned. 

No need to bother if you miss the platform and land on the wrong one! It would take a few chances and you would soon become a master of skill kids game. You can try it out in any of your preferred devices as many times as you want without worrying about downloading unnecessary heavy files, apps or software. Good luck to enter the best world of free online games by browsing through our fastest growing game portal i.e. atmegame.com!!
